author: Miriam Malek, Max Daly
title: Berghain Is Closed. So What Are Berlin's Club-Goers Doing?
description: “I don’t know if I have an STI or coronavirus.”
content: Berlin is the heartland of unfettered hedonism. It's synonymous with sexual liberation. But last month when its clubs and bars, including Europes techno mecca Berghain, had to shut their doors because of coronavirus, it brought the citys notorious clubbing sc… [+7746 chars]
